title: In case where there are a number of dangerous / dilapidated buildings on a plot, in such cases, equi
clause_text: In case where there are a number of dangerous / dilapidated buildings on a plot, in such cases, equivalent land component of such buildings shall be worked out and incentive

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
